front.title: Discovery and Routing over the SMDS Service

abstract.t: This memo expands on RFC 1209 by describing how to do discovery and routing, both for private (intra-domain) and public (inter-domain) applications, over the SDMS service. As such,this memo considers cases where a private network is spread over multiple LISs. In particular, this memo allows hosts or routers in different LISs to exchange packets directly--without going through an intervening router.
